title: Chickpea Gazpacho
ingredients: ['5 large plum tomatoes, diced', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 stalk celery, diced', '1 cucumber - peeled, seeded and diced', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped', 'small handful chopped fresh parsley', '1/2 red pepper, finely chopped', '1/2 yellow pepper, finely chopped', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (1L) bottle tomato juice', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 dash hot pepper sauce, such as Tabasco']
